Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class Player extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
Player class represents the user and player of the board game.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Method isActive returns if a Player is active.
      Returns:
      true if then player is active, so if is playing, false if not connected or waiting to be re-admited in the game.

    • hasCard

      public boolean hasCard(int card)
      Method hasCard checks if a player has a certain AssistantCard.
      Parameters:
      card - the value of the AssistantCard to check the presence for.
      Returns:
      true if the card is present in the Player's hand, false otherwise.
